Package cpp.lab1.gui

Class ConverterGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpp.lab1.gui.ConverterGUI

  • public class ConverterGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides GUI for a Converter class.

    Contents a shell with 2 Label, 2 Text and 2 Button on it that gives user a possibility to convert metres to inches and backwards.

      • buildConvertButtons

        private void buildConvertButtons​()
        Creates, customizes and adds buttons on interface.

      • metreToInchListener

        private void metreToInchListener​()
        Is an action listener for metreToInchButton. Do nothing if metreTextField is empty. Otherwise parse text inside metreTextField to double, on success call convert this number from metres to inches, print error message otherwise.

      • inchToMetreListener

        private void inchToMetreListener​()
        Is an action listener for inchToMetreButton. Do nothing if inchTextField is empty. Otherwise parse text inside inchTextField to double, on success call convert this number from inches to metres, print error message otherwise.

      • buildConvertButton

        private void buildConvertButton​(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button convertButton,
                                java.lang.String text)
        Customizes and adds single button on interface.
        Parameters:
        convertButton - a button that should be built
        text - a button's text
